name: Butter Chicken
description: A rich and creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces, flavored with butter and aromatic spices.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Grilled cottage cheese marinated in yogurt and Indian spices, served with mint chutney.

name: Biryani
description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with fragrant spices, saffron, and marinated meat or vegetables.

name: Chole Bhature
description: A delicious combination of spicy chickpea curry and deep-fried fluffy bread.

name: Mutton Chuka
description: A slow-cooked black lentil dish, rich in cream and butter, flavored with Indian spices.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, roasted in a tandoor (clay oven) for a smoky flavor.

name: Mohinga
description: A traditional Burmese rice noodle soup served in a flavorful fish broth with lemongrass and spices.

name: Laphet Thoke
description: A famous Burmese tea leaf salad mixed with fermented tea leaves, nuts, and vegetables.

name: Shan Noodles
description: Rice noodles served with a flavorful meat-based sauce and garnished with herbs and peanuts.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A fragrant and mildly spiced chicken curry with coconut milk and local spices.

name: Tofu Nway
description: A refreshing salad made with chickpea tofu, garlic, and sesame seeds.

name: Nan Gyi Thoke
description: A thick rice noodle salad with chicken curry and a blend of spices.

name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
description: Crispy chicken stir-fried with a tangy and sweet sauce, combined with bell peppers and pineapples.

name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A spicy stir-fried dish with diced chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.

name: Dim Sum
description: A variety of bite-sized dumplings and buns, served with dipping sauces and tea.

name: Peking Duck
description: A famous Beijing dish featuring crispy duck skin and tender meat, served with pancakes and hoisin sauce.

name: Mapo Tofu
description: A spicy Sichuan dish with tofu, ground pork, and a flavorful chili bean sauce.

name: Chow Mein
description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables and meat, flavored with soy sauce and garlic.
